text: To find all functions \( f: \mathbb{Z} \to \mathbb{Z} \) such that whenever \( a + b + c = 0 \), then \( f(a) + f(b) + f(c) = a^2 + b^2 + c^2 \), we start by analyzing specific cases and deriving necessary conditions.
